translation: the state of the one who has accepted (Naam / Hukam)
if anyone attempts to describe it
no scribe capable of recording it
people sit to discuss the one who has accepted
such is the Naam, such a state of Divine remembrance
it is immaculate, beyond the stain of māyā
if some being inwardly accepts and realizes
then that one alone knows this in their own mind. ||12||
